 2013-13922013-12-12,  JUS,  ,  , 
ActJudges Act (Removal Allowance) Order
SubjectHon. Victoria R. Chiappetta ** REMOVAL ALLOWANCE **
PrecisOrder authorizing an additional period from May 3, 2013 to November 2, 2013 for the reimbursement to the Hon. VICTORIA R. CHIAPPETTA of travelling and lodging costs, including amounts expended for meals, incurred before the establishment of a permanent new residence, or in order to visit from time to time members of the household still residing in the former residence.
AttachmentsAttachment
